biotools.summary: The package allows the representation of targeted experiment in R. This is based on current packages and incorporates functions to do a quality control over this kind of experiments and a fast exploration of the sequenced regions. An xlsx file is generated as output.

bioschemas.name: TarSeqQC
bioschemas.summary: The package allows the representation of targeted experiment in R. This is based on current packages and incorporates functions to do a quality control over this kind of experiments and a fast exploration of the sequenced regions. An xlsx file is generated as output.
